mapper.select: select count(*) from sign s join signline sl on s.DOCNUM = sl.DOCNUM where signstate = 0 and sl.SIGNNING = #{param1}
select count(*) from sign where signstate = 1 and (signer2 = #{param1} or signer3 = #{param1} or signer4 = #{param1} or signer5 = #{param1})
select * from dept order by deptcode asc
select * from emp where empapprove = 1 order by deptcode, teamcode, poscode
select e.userid, e.ename, d.deptname as deptcode, p.posname as poscode from emp e join dept d on e.DEPTCODE = d.DEPTCODE join position p on e.POSCODE = p.POSCODE where e.userid = #{userid}
select * from team order by TEAMCODE asc, DEPTCODE asc
select * from position
mapper.insert: insert into sign(docnum, userid, signtype, dept, team, signfilesrc, signtitle, signnote, signer1, signer2, signer3, signer4, signer5, ename, posname, totalsign, currsign) values((select NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(docnum))+1, 0) from sign), #{userid}, #{signtype}, #{dept}, #{team}, #{signfilesrc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signtitle}, #{signnote, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signer1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signer2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signer3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signer4, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signer5, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ename}, #{posname}, #{totalsign}, #{currsign})

insert into SIGNLINE(docnum, signok1, signok2, signok3, signok4, signok5, signning) values((select NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(docnum)), 0) from sign), #{signok1}, #{signok2}, #{signok3}, #{signok4}, #{signok5}, #{signning})
insert into DRAFTINGDOC(docnum, dracontent) values((select NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(docnum)), 0) from sign), #{dracontent})

insert into orderdoc values((select NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(docnum)), 0) from sign), (select NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(itemnum))+1, 0) from orderdoc), #{product}, #{unitcost}, #{amount}, #{ordersize}, #{ordernote, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordercost})
insert into holidaydoc values((select NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(docnum)), 0) from sign), #{holstart}, #{holend}, #{holtype}, #{holreason}, #{destination})
insert into biztripdoc values((select NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(docnum)), 0) from sign), #{bizstart}, #{bizend}, #{bizloc}, #{bizpur})
insert into biztriprep values((select NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(docnum)), 0) from sign), #{bizrepstart}, #{bizrepend}, #{bizloc}, #{bizpur}, #{bizmem}, #{bizcon}, #{biztot})

insert into biztripcost(DOCNUM, BIZCOSTNUM, BIZCOSTDETAIL, BIZNOTE, BIZCOST) values((select NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(docnum)), 0) from sign), (select NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(bizcostnum))+1, 0) from biztripcost), #{bizcostdetail}, #{biznote, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bizcost})
insert into holiday(userid, attdate, holreason) values( #{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3})
insert into biztrip(userid, attdate, btreason) values( #{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3})
